usbtc08r 1.0.0
  • Reference

    Opens all TC-08 units asynchronously to completion.

    usb_tc08_open_async_complete.Rd

    Opens all TC-08 units asynchronously to completion.

    usb_tc08_open_async_complete()

    Value

    List of TC-08 units opened and ready for set up and running.

    Details

    Runs aggressively with no delay between pending progress results.

    Examples

    # \donttest{
# The following example catches opening-to-completion failures by closing any
# TC-08 units that successfully opened prior to the error.
library(usbtc08r)
tc08 <- list()
tryCatch({usb_tc08_open_async()
  tc08 <- usb_tc08_open_async_complete()
  lapply(tc08, usb_tc08_set_channel, 1L, "K")
  lapply(tc08, usb_tc08_run, 500L)
  lapply(tc08, usb_tc08_get_temp, 10L, 1L, "fahrenheit", FALSE)
}, error = identity, finally = lapply(tc08, usb_tc08_close))
#> <simpleError: invalid integer `-1` value for logical>
#> [[1]]
#> time     temp
#> 1  11000 70.82586
#> 2  11500 70.81340
#> 3  12000 70.80757
#> 4  12500 70.78849
#> 5  13000 70.76282
#> 6  13500 70.76358
#> 7  14000 70.81072
#> 8  14500 70.83801
#> 9  15000 70.83879
#> 10 15500 70.85945
# }
